Class LibraryController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<LibraryView, LibraryController>
musicApp.controllers.SongContainerController<LibraryView, LibraryController, Library>
musicApp.controllers.LibraryController
public class LibraryController extends SongContainerController<LibraryView, LibraryController, Library>
The controller for the Main Library view.

    • toggleFavorites

      public void toggleFavorites(Song song)
      Toggle the favorites status of a song. If the song is already a favorite, it will be removed from the favorites. If the song is not a favorite, it will be added to the favorites.
      Parameters:
      song - the song
